QuestData.Title: The Fields of Ferocity
QuestData.Description:
To the bravest Shikaar!
Gather your best and head on over to the Fields of Ferocity. You could be crowned the fiercest of them all!
Prove your might. Show us your best fight!
Terms and conditions apply.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Gurgthock at the Fields of Ferocity.
QuestData.RewardText:
Hey, you're no centaur.
Ehh. You'll do.
